homepage.title: Zero-Cost PDF Tools
homepage.subtitle: All the tools you need to work with PDFs, 100% free and secure.

merge_pdf.meta_title: Merge PDF | Combine PDFs Online for Free
merge_pdf.meta_description: Easily merge multiple PDF files into a single, organized document online. Free, secure, and works in your browser. No file uploads required.
merge_pdf.title: Merge PDF files
merge_pdf.subtitle: Combine multiple PDFs into a single document.
merge_pdf.dropzone_text: Drag & drop files here, or click to select
merge_pdf.alert_at_least_two: Please select at least two PDF files.
merge_pdf.alert_error_merging: An error occurred while merging the PDFs.

split_pdf.meta_title: Split PDF | Extract Pages from your PDF for Free
split_pdf.meta_description: Free tool to split a PDF file online. Select page ranges to extract and create a new document instantly. Secure and browser-based.
split_pdf.title: Split PDF File
split_pdf.subtitle: Extract one or more pages from your PDF.
split_pdf.dropzone_text: Drag & drop a PDF here, or click to select a file
split_pdf.help_text: Enter page numbers or ranges, separated by commas.

rotate_pdf.meta_title: Rotate PDF | Rotate PDF Pages Online for Free
rotate_pdf.meta_description: Easily rotate individual pages in your PDF file. Rotate left or right and get a live preview before downloading. Secure and free.
rotate_pdf.title: Rotate PDF Pages
rotate_pdf.subtitle: Review and rotate individual pages.

unlock_pdf.meta_title: Unlock PDF | Free Online PDF Password Remover
unlock_pdf.meta_description: Easily remove the password from a protected PDF file online. If you know the password, our free tool can create an unlocked version in seconds. Secure and browser-based.
unlock_pdf.title: Unlock PDF
unlock_pdf.subtitle: Remove the password from your PDF file (password required).
unlock_pdf.error_message: Incorrect password or corrupted file. Please try again.

add_watermark.meta_title: Add Watermark to PDF | Free Online Watermarking Tool
add_watermark.meta_description: Easily add a text watermark to your PDF documents. Customize text, font size, and opacity. Secure and free to use in your browser.
add_watermark.title: Add Watermark to PDF
add_watermark.subtitle: Apply a text watermark to every page of your PDF.
add_watermark.how_to_title: How to Add a Watermark to a PDF
add_watermark.how_to_step_1: Drag and drop your PDF file into the upload area.
add_watermark.how_to_step_2: Enter the text for your watermark in the input field.
add_watermark.how_to_step_3: Adjust the font size and opacity using the sliders to see a live preview.
add_watermark.how_to_step_4: Click 'Add Watermark & Download' to process and save your new PDF.

add_text.meta_title: Add Text to PDF | Free Online PDF Text Editor
add_text.meta_description: Add new text boxes to any page of your PDF document. Drag, resize, and type your text directly on the preview. 100% free and secure.
add_text.title: Add Text to PDF
add_text.subtitle: Add, edit, and place new text boxes on your document.
add_text.how_to_title: How to Add Text to a PDF
add_text.how_to_step_2: Click the 'Add Text Box' button. A new box will appear on the current page.
add_text.how_to_step_3: Click inside the box to type your new text.
add_text.how_to_step_4: Drag the box to move it or drag the corners to resize it.
add_text.how_to_step_5: Click 'Apply Text & Download' to save your changes.
